subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: The United States, which lost to Belgium on Tuesday, finished in the top half of a 32-team tournament. Was the World Cup a success for the American team?
snippet: The United States, which lost to Belgium on Tuesday, finished in the top half of a 32-team tournament. Was the World Cup a success for the American team?
